interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Bottled Dreams " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " There is Nothing " .

progression.synopsis: The girls are handing out Christmas presents, and Sensei still doesn't know who he drew for Secret Santa. It turns out to be Maya , despite her earlier denial — the scarf he gave her can be counted as her present. They are interrupted by Yumi , who had to get Sensei a present — Chika and Chinami insisted and supervised. Sensei wonders if getting a present from Yumi counts as a Christmas miracle.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.11.

navigation.next_event: Fireworks, Chicken, and the Innate Fear of Death
